item.description:
As some of you may know I run the Red Sox Natives group.

The Red Sox Natives are inviting Tonya and the Boston Happy Hour peeps to join us on Sunday, March 28 for our special Palm Sunday event.

If you are available, Go to www.RedSoxNatives.com for complete details and times.

Join us for the whole morning, the Service or just the breakfast at Teele Square Cafe (around 12 pm) or the cocktails afterward at a nearby location to be determined (probably Orleans).

Please let us know if you will be joining us.

Thanks,

Frank
item.name: Blessing of the Red Sox Natives/ 2010 Season, Worship/ Breakfast/Cocktails
